Week 8 - Library Workshop

Monday

We will meet in the library for a workshop about scientific literature. Please meet in Hunter 186 (main floor of library, go right after circulation desk, then 186 is on left).

This workshop will help you complete the final iteration of your claims assignment and prepare you for writing your final paper on your air quality sensor.

To do:

  • Your claims will be passed back in class. You will work on researching it in detail.
  • You will need to work on a computer. You may bring your laptop or use the computers in the library, whichever you prefer.

Wednesday

We will finish building the sensors.

To do:

  • Bring a laptop
  • Bring a USB A adapter (if needed for your computer)
  • Finish your sensor!!
  • Turn in your sensor by the end of class!

Due on Friday

  • Scientific Claims Report
  • Template available here
